verses.verse: Now <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> was toward <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8620>Tekoah<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> there a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H56>her<s%>, I pray you, feign yourself to be a mourner, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> now <S%H60>mourning<s%> <S%H899>apparel<s%>, and <S%H5480>anoint<s%> not yourself with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, but be as a <S%H802>woman<s%> that had a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>:
And <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> on this <S%H1697>manner<s%> unto <S%H3097>him<s%>. So Joab <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> in her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, she <S%H5307>fell<s%> on her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and did <S%H7812>bow<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3467>Help<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>her<s%>, What ails you? And she answered, I am <S%H61>indeed<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, and my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

And your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and they <S%H8147>two<s%> argued <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and there was none to <S%H5337>part<s%> <S%H259>them<s%>, but the one <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H259>other<s%>, and killed <S%H4191>him<s%>.

<S%H4940>And<s%>, behold, the whole family is <S%H6965>risen<s%> against your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Deliver<s%> him that <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, that we may <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H5315>him<s%>, for the life of his <S%H251>brother<s%> whom he <S%H2026>killed<s%>; and we will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H3423>heir<s%> <S%H3518>also<s%>: and so they shall quench my <S%H1513>coal<s%> which is <S%H7760>left<s%>, and shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> to my <S%H376>husband<s%> neither <S%H8034>name<s%> nor <S%H7611>remainder<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> to your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and I will give charge concerning <S%H6680>you<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, My <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be on <S%H1>me<s%>, and on my father's <S%H1004>house<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Whoever <S%H1696>says<s%> anything unto <S%H935>you<s%>, bring him to <S%H5060>me<s%>, and he shall not touch you any <S%H3254>more<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H4428>she<s%>, I pray you, let the king <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, that you would not allow the <S%H1350>revengers<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> any <S%H7235>more<s%>, lest they <S%H8045>destroy<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, there shall not one <S%H8185>hair<s%> of your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, I pray <S%H1696>you<s%>, speak one <S%H1697>word<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Say <S%H1696>on<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Why then have you <S%H2803>thought<s%> such a thing against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>? for the <S%H4428>king<s%> does <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> as one which is <S%H818>faulty<s%>, in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> does not fetch home <S%H7725>again<s%> his <S%H5080>banished<s%>.

For we must <S%H4191>needs<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, and are as <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5064>spilt<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%>, which cannot be gathered up <S%H622>again<s%>; neither does <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>respect<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%>: yet does he <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>means<s%>, that his <S%H5080>banished<s%> be not expelled from <S%H5080>him<s%>.

Now therefore that I am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> of this <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, it is because the <S%H5971>people<s%> have made me <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: and your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will now <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>; it may be that the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H519>handmaid<s%>.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H519>handmaid<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> that would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> me and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall now be <S%H4496>comfortable<s%>: for as an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, so is my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8085>discern<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>bad<s%>: therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your God will be with <S%H430>you<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H3582>Hide<s%> not from <S%H1697>me<s%>, I pray you, the thing that I shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H802>you<s%>. And the woman <S%H559>said<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> now <S%H1696>speak<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is not the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> with you in all <S%H802>this<s%>? And the woman <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, As your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H786>can<s%> turn to the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8041>left<s%> from anything that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, he <S%H6680>told<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>, and he put all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>:

<S%H5668>To<s%> turn <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of this <S%H1697>matter<s%> has your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: and my <S%H113>lord<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, according to the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> all things that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, Behold <S%H6213>now<s%>, I have done this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7725>therefore<s%>, bring the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H1288>himself<s%>, and thanked the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H3117>day<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6213>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1650>Geshur<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let him <S%H5437>turn<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and let him not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>. So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face<s%>.

But in all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there was <S%H376>none<s%> to be so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> as <S%H53>Absalom<s%> for his <S%H3303>beauty<s%>: from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> even to the crown of his <S%H6936>head<s%> there was no blemish in <S%H3971>him<s%>.

And when he <S%H1548>cut<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, (for it was at every <S%H3117>year<s%>'s <S%H7093>end<s%> that he <S%H1548>cut<s%> <S%H3513>it<s%>: because the hair was heavy on <S%H1548>him<s%>, therefore he cut <S%H8254>it<s%>:) he weighed the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> at two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> after the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H68>weight<s%>.

And unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%> there were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8559>Tamar<s%>: she was a <S%H802>woman<s%> of a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H4758>favor<s%>.
So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Therefore <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, to have <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%>; but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7971>him<s%>: and when he sent again the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, <S%H3097>Joab<s%>'s <S%H2513>field<s%> is <S%H413>near<s%> <S%H3027>my<s%>, and he has <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3212>there<s%>; go and <S%H3341>set<s%> it on <S%H784>fire<s%>. And <S%H53>Absalom<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Then <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5650>him<s%>, Why have your servants <S%H3341>set<s%> my <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>?

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, <S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I sent unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H7971>here<s%>, that I may send you to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, to <S%H559>say<s%>, Why am I <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H1650>Geshur<s%>? it would be <S%H2896>better<s%> for me to have stayed there <S%H7200>still<s%>: now therefore let me see the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face<s%>; and if there <S%H3426>be<s%> any <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in <S%H4191>me<s%>, let him kill me.
